body.p: Cyrus Lillard States that he lives about 6 miles from Margolyes Tavern, that he recollects to have Eat at said Margolyes. and found the diet to be good as could be wanted, I Never heard of any complaint of any scarcity either for man or beast
Given under my hand this 21st Nov 1861
Sworn to before me this 21st November 1861
Edward Pate J, P, B, C
